backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with user, service, task, audit-log, and access‑code related types and modules, plus applies migration on upgrade.
backend/migration.mo: Adds a requestType field (default NORMAL) to each stored task record during upgrade mapping.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or analysis.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the root element and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the router, global providers, and all top‑level application routes using TanStack Router and React Query.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Renders an access‑denied UI with branding and a button redirecting users back to internal login.
frontend/src/components/AccessGate.tsx: Verifies user role and status before rendering protected content, showing errors or access-denied screens if checks fail.
frontend/src/components/audit/AuditLogTa: Empty placeholder file for an audit log table component.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo image in horizontal or icon variant.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDel: Gates child content based on whether the client has an active layanan, showing alerts when unavailable.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientLay: Fetches and displays the client's layanan list with status badges and service details.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSer: Form and list UI for clients to submit service requests and view existing tasks, handling submission, validation, and request type badges.
frontend/src/components/CopyRow.tsx: Displays a labeled read-only value with a button to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSidebar: Sidebar menu with logo and buttons for navigating between dashboard sections.
frontend/src/components/internal-access/: Empty placeholder file for admin internal access panel.
Empty placeholder file for internal access panel.
frontend/src/components/InternalGateGuar: Checks session-based internal gate access and redirects users to internal unlock flow if expired or missing.
frontend/src/components/LandingFooter.ts: Landing page footer with contact link, legal links, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Sticky landing page header with navigation, language toggle, and auth buttons that react to scroll state.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Two-button toggle allowing switching between English and Indonesian locales.
frontend/src/components/layanan/BuatLaya: Form to create a new layanan, assign an asistenmu, manage share principals, and submit creation followed by assignment.
frontend/src/components/layanan/DaftarLa: Displays a table of user layanan with details, status, and actions for viewing, updating, editing asistenmu, and deactivating.
frontend/src/components/layanan/EditAsis: Modal for updating the assigned asistenmu of a layanan, including candidate selection and save handling.
frontend/src/components/layanan/LayananD: Read‑only modal showing full layanan details including dates, status, asistenmu, and share principals.
frontend/src/components/layanan/LayananU: Modal for editing a layanan’s share principals, allowing add/remove and saving changes.
frontend/src/components/layanan/Manajeme: Main layanan management page combining the creation form and layanan list with refresh coordination.
frontend/src/components/LockedPanel.tsx: Displays a disabled panel indicating a locked or unavailable feature.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a fallback UI with reload option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAsistenmuAssignmen: Provides queries and mutations for fetching Asistenmu candidates and assigning them to Layananku, with cache updates and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Contains hooks for creating client service requests and fetching a client's tasks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider with login, logout, and identity-loading logic via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLayananku.ts: Offers hooks to create, fetch, update, and check status of Layananku records, managing related cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching user profiles and registering clients, partners, or internal users, plus claiming superadmin role.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining color tokens and global styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports static paths to brand asset images.
frontend/src/lib/forms/registrationSchem: Defines data interfaces and form field metadata for client and partner registration forms.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines locale types and a large list of translation keys for EN/ID UI text.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides preset WhatsApp messages and utilities to generate encoded WhatsApp contact links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query client and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with sidebar navigation and multiple admin management sections gated by admin access.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientDashboar: Client workspace dashboard with user greeting and tabs for profile, services, requests, and delegation.
frontend/src/pages/internal/AsistenmuDas: Internal dashboard for Asistenmu role showing localized headings and placeholder content.
frontend/src/pages/internal/FinanceDashb: Internal Finance workspace dashboard displaying localized summary and placeholder finance content.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRole: Error page shown when internal user role doesn't match workspace, offering navigation back to login.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ManagementDa: Renders a management dashboard wrapped in an AccessGate, showing localized titles and a placeholder card.
frontend/src/pages/internal/SupervisorDa: Displays a supervisor dashboard with localized headers and a placeholder card, protected by AccessGate.
frontend/src/pages/InternalGatePage.tsx: Implements an internal access code gate with temporary client-side validation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/InternalLoginPage.tsx: Handles internal user login, role-based workspace routing, and optional superadmin claiming.
Provides internal user registration flow with role selection and Internet Identity login.
Displays the privacy policy page with brief content and a button to return to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero section, service listings, localized text, and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity auth, role-based workspace routing, and backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerDashbo: Shows a partner dashboard with sidebar navigation, user data display, and menu-based content including profile and summaries.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration page for client and partner roles with form handling, validation, and API-driven profile creation.
frontend/src/pages/superadmin/Superadmin: Implements a superadmin dashboard with menu-driven sections including summaries, user/task management, and a layanan view.
frontend/src/pages/SyaratKetentuanPage.t: Static terms-and-conditions page with basic text and a button returning to the homepage.
frontend/src/providers/LocaleProvider.ts: Provides locale state via context, syncing with localStorage and exposing a hook for reading/updating locale.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, requirements, architectural notes, issues, and existing features metadata.
